br.fml.eti.machinegun
Class Target<T>

java.lang.Object
  br.fml.eti.machinegun.Target<T>

public class Target<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A Target groups all the information needed to a bullet (data) reaches your right destination (be processed in the right way).

Method Detail

getQueueName

public java.lang.String getQueueName()
Returns:
The name of the persisted internal queue used to this kind of data.

workOnIt

public void workOnIt(long idJob,
                     java.lang.String consumerName,
                     ArmyAudit audit,
                     T data)
              throws BuildingException
Creates a DirtyWork and delegate the action to it.

Parameters:
idJob - a unique number to identify this job
consumerName - A consumer name, like "Consumer 2 of 8"
audit - To inspect the internal execution
data - The data to be processed
Throws:
BuildingException - if something went wrong on dirty work factory production.
